title: 106: WTF is Human Design? (ft. Erin Claire Jones)
itunes:title: 106: WTF is Human Design? (ft. Erin Claire Jones)
description:
Today the Broads are chatting about a brand new topic for them: Human Design. They are joined by Erin Claire Jones - a leadership coach specializing in Human Design (aka a system that brings together principles of The I Ching, astrology, Kabbalah, Hindu-Brahmin chakra system, and quantum physics system that brings together principles of The I Ching, astrology, Kabbalah, Hindu-Brahmin chakra system, and quantum physics that offers a manual that indicates your uniqueness as a person). They chat about where Human Design came from, the 5 types, the basics, and Erin dives into Bekah and Jess' "blueprints". Broads, use the link below to take the test and find out what type you are! 
ERIN CLAIRE JONES:
Find out your design here: erinclairejones.com/lookup (https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Ferinclairejones.com%2Flookup&data=02%7C01%7C%7Cce3a23881a254ed3c9a908d77fe24cbb%7C84df9e7fe9f640afb435aaaaaaaaaaaa%7C1%7C0%7C637118482232694309&sdata=s0PAaWHnudQB%2FehflV4zBCTGDZINaPg500b6oWxX%2B2o%3D&reserved=0)
Website: erinclairejones.com (https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Ferinclairejones.com&data=02%7C01%7C%7Cce3a23881a254ed3c9a908d77fe24cbb%7C84df9e7fe9f640afb435aaaaaaaaaaaa%7C1%7C0%7C637118482232704318&sdata=zRL0ROPTdgqXSQj0NZdT0IkUZTPajE4Qs%2BlP3LXuctc%3D&reserved=0)
